name: PIGWorld
description:
O' Traveler, you finally made your way to the small Kingdom named PIGSteam! King needs your help, so be on your way and don't test his patience!

In this game, you can click the NPCs to speak to them if required by your questline. The first NPC you will meet is the king.  SHIFT to run.

Coding/design - Vova Bunchuk
Music - Arwen 
Voice acting - Dylan, Arwen, Aura, Will, Teo, Vova
Art - Vlada
Special thanks to Dylan for letting me steal... I mean, use his FPS Controller code!
